DOC.brief_summary: This multi-center, two-treatment study compares the pharmacokinetic profiles of Immediate Release (IR) and Modified Release (MR) formulations of Topiramate (TPM) in patients with epilepsy.
DOC.brief_title: A Conversion Study of Immediate Release (IR) and Modified Release (MR) Forms of Topiramate (TPM)
DOC.criteria: 1. Adult male or female patients with epilepsy on stable doses of topiramate. 2. Able to voluntarily provide written informed consent to participate in the study. 3. Use of an effective form of birth control if of childbearing potential. 1. Diagnosis of status epilepticus, nonepileptic seizures, or any progressive CNS disease. 2. Recent or recurrent suicidal thoughts or ideation. 3. Clinically significant medical condition that may affect the safety of the subject. 4. Females who are pregnant or lactating.
